title: The Legend of Celda: Breath of the Mild
description: Embark on an epic adventure as Celda, a brave hero, to save the kingdom of Hyboria from the dark forces.

title: Sanic the Hedhog: Fast and Furrious
description: Join Sanic the fastest hedgehog alive in his quest to defeat the evil Dr. Robotnik and collect golden onion rings.

title: Super Plumber Bros.: Kingdom Rescue
description: Help the famous Super Plumber Bros., Mario, and Luigi, rescue Princess Peaches from the clutches of Bowzor.

title: Doomed: Eternal Conquest
description: Battle against the forces of hell and save humanity as the Doom Slayer in this intense first-person shooter.

title: Fortressnite: Battle Crown
description: Build, shoot, and survive in this last-player-standing battle royale game. Can you be the Battle Crown champion?

title: Assassin's Greed: Odyssey
description: Step into the shoes of a cunning assassin and navigate the world of ancient Greece to uncover hidden treasures and secrets.

title: Call of Ducky: Quack Ops
description: Experience the ultimate quacking warfare in this realistic first-duck shooter.

title: Cyberdump 2069: Garbage Simulator
description: Explore the dystopian cyber city of NeoNokyo as a garbage collector, navigating through heaps of electronic waste and uncovering mysterious secrets.

title: Worldcraft: Block and Build
description: Unleash your creativity and build incredible worlds, block by block, in this open-world sandbox game.
